item.title: TED: 'The laws that sex workers really want | Toni Mac'
item.description:
Everyone has an opinion about how to legislate sex work (whether to legalize it, ban it or even tax it) ... but what do workers themselves think would work best? Activist Toni Mac explains four legal models that are being used around the world and shows us the model that she believes will work best to keep sex workers safe and offer greater self-determination. "If you care about gender equality or poverty or migration or public health, then sex worker rights matter to you," she says. "Make space for us in your movements." (Adult themes)

TEDTalks is a daily video podcast of the best talks and performances from the TED Conference, where the world's leading thinkers and doers give the talk of their lives in 18 minutes (or less). Look for talks on Technology, Entertainment and Design -- plus science, business, global issues, the arts and much more.

Find closed captions and translated subtitles in many languages at http://www.ted.com/translate

Follow TED news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/tednews

Like TED on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TED

item.title: Tasty: 'Philly Cheese Steak Bagel Bites'
item.description:
Here is what you'll need!

Serving Size: 12

INGREDIENTS

6 mini sized bagels, halved

8 ounces steak

1/2 cup green bell pepper, diced

1/2 cup onion, diced

1/2 cup mushroom, diced

Salt, to taste

Pepper, to taste

Olive oil

12 slices Provolone cheese, or white American

PREPARATION

Preheat the oven to 400ºF.

Cut steak into small chunks, if it’s hard to cut, chill steak in freezer for 30 minutes.

Heat oil in a cast iron skillet over high heat, add steak pieces, sear on a high heat for 1-2 minutes, then remove steak from pan.

Keep the juice from searing steak in skillet, and add pepper and onion, cook for 3-4 minutes, then add mushrooms.

Add steak back into skillet, then season with salt and pepper. After everything is mixed well, remove the skillet from heat, set aside.

Place bagel slices on a baking sheet, then put about 2 tablespoons of meat and veggie mixture on each bagel slice, top with a slice of Provolone cheese.

Bake for 12-15 minutes at 400ºF / 200˚C until the cheese is melted and bagel is crispy on the bottom.

Serve immediately, enjoy!

MUSIC

Southern Sunday

Licensed via Audio Network Inc.

All music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc. Used with permission

item.title: Tasty: 'Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato, and Avocado Salad'
item.description:
Here is what you'll need!

Ingredients

8 strips bacon

1 head of romaine lettuce, chopped

2 handfuls cherry or grape tomatoes, halved

Half a cucumber

2 avocados, chopped

4 Tbsp. olive oil

2 Tbsp. Balsamic Vinegar

1 tsp mustard

1 tsp salt

1 lemon, juiced

Instructions

1. Cook bacon until crispy. Drain on a paper towel, then set aside.

2. Place chopped lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, avocados and bacon in a large bowl.

3. In a small bowl, mix olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and lemon juice to form the dressing.

4. Toss the salad with the dressing and enjoy!

Inspired by http://www.thelondoner.me/2014/01/blt-bowl.html

Music provided by Audio Network. Used with permission

item.title: DigitalRev TV: 'Pentax K-1 Hands-on Review'
item.description:
Pentax are finally ready to join the big boys with their first full-frame DSLR. Kai puts it through orientation with a little sand, water, and a transparent vibrator.

[Playlist]: http://bit.ly/1stIMPS

[Subscribe]: http://bit.ly/DRTVSub

—————————

Pricing reference:

http://bit.ly/1OhQJjt

Read more about the Pentax K-1 on DigitalRev:

https://bokeh.digitalrev.com/article/the-new-pentax-k-1-offers-36-mp-for-1800

https://bokeh.digitalrev.com/article/pentax-k-1-designers-discuss-building-the-dslr-of-the-future

https://bokeh.digitalrev.com/article/pentax-k1-hands-on-first-impressions

We played with the K-1 back in Hong Kong and tried out some of the features, but how does it fare in the real world? Kai puts it through a battle with the elements in order to find out if this Pentax is as tough as it looks.

Main Features:

36.4MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor

5 axis, 5 shutter step built-in SR mechanism

Pixels Shift Resolution

ISO 204800

Newly developed image engine, PRIME IV

Flexible Tilt Type LCD monitor

AA Filter Simulator

New AF system, SAFOX 12

Built-in Wi-Fi, GPS, ASTROTRACER

Previous video: http://tv.digitalrev.com/v/uo2T3kFGeiU/PLYF2uMtYcs-k9aPKMdbZGJk4Y1uEIUK1E

VLOG CAMERA SET UP -

Sony A7s mk2 - http://goo.gl/ebgmfM

Sony 24-240 f4 - http://goo.gl/zOLnHV

Sony RX100 mk4 - http://goo.gl/8jQQNN

PHOTOGRAPHY -

Canon 1D & 5D mk3 - http://goo.gl/NjMLAq

Canon 24-70 2.8 - http://goo.gl/Jh5vWa

Canon 24mm 1.4 - http://goo.gl/jFcBI1

Canon 35mm 1.4 - http://goo.gl/I0RKwT

Canon 16-35 2.8 - http://goo.gl/T63ple

EXTRAS

Backpack - http://goo.gl/IAsAok

Dji Osmo - http://goo.gl/AakJbe

GoPro Session - http://goo.gl/xyAxHN

GoPro Hero 4 Black - http://goo.gl/lHLYIT

__

FAQs - for those of you bright enough to read the description before commenting with the same boring questions ... :)

- How old are you? - 30

- Where do you live? - Surrey, UK & Cape Town South Africa

- What hair product do you use? - Sea water and/or Ruffians Wax

- What do you ask for at the hairdresser? - shorter on the sides than the top.

- What breed of dog is Alfie & Georgie? - Tibetan Terrier

- When did you start kayaking? - When I was 8 years old.

- What do your tattoos mean? My star was just because I thought it looked good. My skull was my reward for winning the marathon world championships in 2010, my triangle on my hand reminds me to keep moving forward and make progress, and my turtle/Pura Vida tattoo on my leg is a reminder of my amazing time in Costa Rica. New tattoos - mountains on my arm & VV on my wrist because I didn't know what I wanted until 5 mins before I got them!

- How do you make money? - YouTube/Freelance film/photo & my clothing brand

- Do you ship clothing world wide? - We ship to most countries.

- What editing program do you use? - Premier Pro CC on Mac

- Did you go to university? - No

- Why do yo buy so many cameras? I'm a photographer & film maker, cameras / lenses are my thing.

- Why aren't you training for kayaking anymore? - I see new opportunities everyday, I'm just grabbing them as they appear and keep working hard, right now that's YouTube & Film. I'm happy I made the change!

- How long do your vlogs take to edit? - They vary massively, sometimes 1 hour sometimes 6+

Still got questions? Watch my last Q&A video! - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=44ivb91Hk-s

__

P.s. I love my subscribers :) xx

item.title: iJustine: ':('
item.description:
I'm sad. I'm angry. I'm confused. I'm sure you are all having very similar feelings. We're all in this together. I love you and please be kind.

If you or someone you know need someone to talk to please don't be afraid to get help. If you are struggling with not knowing where to look, there are tons of resources online. If you have a link you'd like to share that you feel could help someone, please share in the comments

Check out http://www.nami.org for more info on mental health awareness and places to find help.

http://www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org or call 1-800-273-TALK (8255) to be connected to a trained counselor at a crisis center in your area, anytime 24/7

item.title: Machinima: 'Xbox One Slim LEAKED? [confirmed $299] - Inside Gaming Daily'
item.description:
Matt Damon returns to his most iconic role in Jason Bourne. Paul Greengrass, the director of The Bourne Supremacy and The Bourne Ultimatum, once again joins Damon for the next chapter of Universal Pictures’ Bourne franchise, which finds the CIA’s most lethal former operative drawn out of the shadows. Based on the characters created by Robert Ludlum, the film is written by Greengrass and Christopher Rouse. www.jasonbournemovie.com

UPDATE: The Xbox One S is now confirmed. It will launch this August, no exact date yet, for $299.

Less than 24 hours before Microsoft's E3 press conference, supposed images of the Xbox One Slim, or Xbox One S have leaked online.

item.title: FilmTrailerZone: 'MOANA Official Trailer (2016) Dwayne Johnson Animation Movie'
item.description:
MOANA Official Trailer (2016) Dwayne Johnson Disney Animation Movie

Subscribe to FilmTrailerZone: http://ow.ly/adpvg

Like us on Facebook: http://ow.ly/rduc2

Follow us on Twitter: http://ow.ly/ay0gU

Three thousand years ago, the greatest sailors in the world voyaged across the vast Pacific, discovering the many islands of Oceania. But then, for a millennium, their voyages stopped – and no one knows why.

From Walt Disney Animation Studios comes “Moana,” a sweeping, CG-animated feature film about an adventurous teenager who sails out on a daring mission to save her people. During her journey, Moana (voice of Auli’i Cravalho) meets the once-mighty demigod Maui (voice of Dwayne Johnson), who guides her in her quest to become a master wayfinder. Together, they sail across the open ocean on an action-packed voyage, encountering enormous monsters and impossible odds, and along the way, Moana fulfills the ancient quest of her ancestors and discovers the one thing she’s always sought: her own identity. Directed by the renowned filmmaking team of Ron Clements and John Musker (“The Little Mermaid,” “Aladdin,” “The Princess & the Frog”) and produced by Osnat Shurer (“Lifted,” “One Man Band”), “Moana” sails into U.S. theaters on Nov. 23, 2016.

Release Date: November 23, 2016

Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy

Directors: Ron Clements, John Musker

Writers: Jared Bush, Ron Clements

Stars: Dwayne Johnson, Alan Tudyk, Auli'i Cravalho

Moana official trailer courtesy of Walt Disney Animation Studios.

FilmTrailerZone is the #1 destination for all movie fans to catch the latest movie trailers, clips, featurettes & much more of the latest promotional content from your most anticipated movies!
